name: INBODY 580 BODY SCAN
description: Take control of your health and fitness goals with the InBody 580 Body Scan, now available at a special limited-time promo price of RM80 (normal walk-in price: RM150)! This premium scan provides a comprehensive breakdown of your body composition, including muscle mass, body fat percentage, visceral fat, body water, segmental muscle balance, metabolic rate, and more, in just minutes.

name: HYROX TRAINING
description: Get race-day ready with our high-energy HYROX Training Class â€“ a performance-driven group workout that blends functional strength and endurance training to prepare you for the ultimate fitness race. Whether you're aiming to compete or just want to push your limits, this class is designed to build speed, power, stamina, and mental toughness.

name: GROUP CLASSES
description: At Breakaway Fitness Cyberjaya, our Group Classes are designed to energize, motivate, and support you every step of the way. Whether you're just starting out or looking to take your fitness to the next level, there's a class for everyone. Train alongside others in a supportive and fun group environment led by experienced instructors who are passionate about helping you succeed.
